Articles.Content:
Hi New User!1st post and 1st landing......sort of...*This is Burwise Keman,reporting from the Mun......*

*Was the Mission successful Burwise?*

*Not exactly...*![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

![screenshot6.png](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-aRbzK284l-I/VNvRZJ4BKsI/AAAAAAAABKU/yuEnsnAQdPI/w346-h260/screenshot6.png)

KASA has achieved a Mun landing!Well the Kerbal landed.......the ship,however...............![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Burwise,unfortunatley,died trying to EVA back.

Let us honor this great hero....![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
First Mun landings are special, well done Vexxus9999, and condolences to Burwise.

Welcome to the forums!

from me... 1 rep=1 salute for Burwise

1st landings are always knuckle biters. Aww the memories. Sorry for the loss but his death will not be wasted. You shall learn from this and be better for it. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
I actually planted a flag to commemorate the great Mun Lander Burwise.May he rest in peace...![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
